name: GENERAL CHAOS II: Sons Of Chaos
blurb: The long awaited remake of the first, and funniest, squad-based real-time strategy battle game!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Thanks for helping us bring Chaos & Havoc back to the battlefield! We really appreciate your support!

Weekly Development Blog - Every game development experience is unique, and this one promises to be filled with fun and surprises. Follow our Team's progress as our artists, animators, programmers and play-testers share their personal observations about the process from start to finish.

Digital Download of the Finished Game for PC - Also includes: The Weekly Development Blog. (Note that the delivery date below reflects the delivery of the Finished Game, the Blog will start in October of 2013.)

Standard Issue - General Chaos Dog Tags that identify you as a supporter, and a General Chaos Mouse Pad that can be used as a tiny uncomfortable pillow during remote bivouacs. Also includes: Digital Download of the Finished Game and the Weekly Development Blog. (Note that the delivery date below reflects the delivery of the Finished Game, the Dog Tags & Mouse Pad will ship in November, 2013.)

Masterworks Collection - A Digital Portfolio showcasing of The Art of General Chaos from concept to completion, AND a limited edition print of Rampage World Tour Concept Art created by Aaron Hartline & Brian Colin; autographed by the game designers!  Also includes: the Finished Game and the Weekly Development Blog. (Note that the date below reflects the delivery of the Finished Game and the Digital Art Portfolio, the Autographed Art Print will ship in November, 2013.)

Field Dressing -  Digital access to an Early Release \u201cField Test\u201d version of the Game, and a General Chaos Tee Shirt that identifies you as a "Backer." Also includes: the Dog Tags, Mouse Pad, the Finished Game and the Weekly Development Blog. (Note that the date below reflects the delivery of the Finished Game, the Early Release Field Test will be available approximately 6-8 weeks before the Game's completion. The physical items will ship in November, 2013.)

"PLUNDER" - The Spoils of War Package #1 - \r\nIncludes everything listed above: the General Chaos Backer Tee Shirt, access to the "Field Test" (BETA) version of the game, the Autographed Concept Art Print, the Digital Art Portfolio, the Dog Tags, the Mouse Pad, the the Weekly Development Blog and, of course, the Digital Download of the Finished Game.

Designer\u2019s Memorabilia #1 - Udderly Ridiculous Games -  These are actual self adhesive vinyl "redemption game" cabinet side art panels we've literally had rolled up in the attic for years.... Autographed by the designers. Set of two; 1 large, 1 small. Note that these are not in pristine condition, they will need to be flattened. Also includes: "PLUNDER" - The Spoils of War Package #1

Veteran Commander - A limited edition collectable General Chaos Toy PVC Figure that stands 12 cm tall, and an in-game Campaign Honors Medal (a Profile Badge that bestows early access to advanced Leadership features.) Also includes: "PLUNDER" - The Spoils of War Package #1.

Veteran Assault Squad -  A limited edition Set of Five different collectable PVC Grunt Figures that stands 9.5 cm tall, and an in-game Unit Endurance Medal (a Profile Badge that bestows advanced Initiative features.)\r\n\r\nAlso includes:Everything in "PLUNDER" - The Spoils of War Package #1.

GOIN\u2019 COMMANDO - The Spoils of War Package #2 - Includes: BOTH the General Chaos PVC Figure AND the Set of Five Veteran Assault Squad PVC Figures, the Campaign Honors Medal, the Unit Endurance Medal, and everything in "PLUNDER" - The Spoils of War Package #1.

Designer\u2019s Memorabilia #2 - Space Shooter - More self-adhesive vinyl "space gun game" cabinet side art panels we found rolled up in the attic.... Autographed by the designers. Set of four; 2 large, 1 medium, 1 small. Note that these are not in pristine condition, they will need to be flattened. Also includes everything from: "GOIN' COMMANDO" - The Spoils of War Package #2.

"CHAOS CHAMPION" - Spoils of War Package #3 - Limited Edition General Chaos bronze finish resin statue, and The Order of the Iron Fist Medallion (a Profile Badge that unlocks instant access to new Character classes.) Also includes: Everything in "GOIN' COMMANDO" - The Spoils of War Package #2.

Designer\u2019s Memorabilia #3 - Monster Smash Hit -  Autographed by the designers, these self adhesive vinyl cabinet side art panels have been kept in a drawer for the last 20 years. Pristine condition. Also includes: Everything in "CHAOS CHAMPION" - The Spoils of War Package #3.

Designer\u2019s Honors - "RECON" - You can name &/or Help Define an In-Game Location. Includes Recon Ribbon (a Profile Badge that bestows a \u201chome turf advantage\u201d.) In addition, all Designer\u2019s Honors rewards feature your Name in the Game\u2018s Design Credits, exclusive access to ongoing new content evaluation, and the CHAOS CHAMPION - Spoils of War Package # 3.

Designer\u2019s Honors - "WARMONGER" - You can name &/or Help Define A NEW Weapon or Weapon Upgrade. Includes Armament Emblem (a Profile Badge that gives instant access to weapon upgrades.) In addition, all Designer\u2019s Honors feature your Name in the Game\u2018s Design Credits, exclusive access to ongoing new content evaluation, and the CHAOS CHAMPION - Spoils of War Package # 3.

Designer\u2019s Honors - QUARTERMASTER - You can Name &/or Help Define unique Provisions and Special Objects. Includes S.O.A.L. Patch (a Profile Badge that identifies you as a Special Object Acquisition Liaison that gives instant access to Special Objects.) In addition, all Designer\u2019s Honors feature your Name in the Game\u2018s Design Credits, exclusive access to ongoing new content evaluation, and the CHAOS CHAMPION - Spoils of War Package # 3.

Designer\u2019s Honors - INTELLIGENTSIA - You can Name &/or Help Define a Grunt or Character\u2019s Back-story. Includes Oxymoron Insignia (a Profile Badge that gives instant access to \u201cheightened awareness\u201d.) In addition, all Designer\u2019s Honors feature your Name in the Game\u2018s Design Credits, exclusive access to ongoing new content evaluation, and the CHAOS CHAMPION - Spoils of War Package # 3.

Designer’s Honors / CHAOS THEORY: 

If you don’t want to limit your creativity to a single topic, then maybe you’d like to join the Chaos Design Team at the Game Refuge Development Offices for a four-hour Brainstorming session during the early months of development. Share your ideas with the designers as they wrestle with some of the fun, (and not so fun), development issues that arise on a daily basis.

Also Includes all four Design Related Profile Badges, your Name in the Game‘s Design Credits, exclusive access to ongoing new content evaluation, an invitation to the afternoon Launch Party Reception when the finished game is released, and the CHAOS CHAMPION - Spoils of War Package # 3.

Launch Party Weekend - The weekend starts with a Saturday afternoon Launch Party Reception for you and a guest at GRI\u2019s Chicago-land Development offices, followed by an evening of Dining & Celebration with the Chaos Team: Designers, Artists, Programmers, the rest of the Game Refuge crew, and special guests & colleagues from Chicago\u2019s Game Development community! Accommodations will be provided at a first rate hotel. After a restorative breakfast, you\u2019ll hang with the Team as we make an invitation-only free-play foray to one of the world\u2019s finest independent Arcades, the Galloping Ghost. Also Includes all four Design Related Profile Badges, your Name in the Game\u2018s \u201cSpecial Thanks\u201d Credits, access to ongoing new content evaluation through out the development process, and the CHAOS CHAMPION - Spoils of War Package # 3.

"ARCADIUM AETERNUM" - Ultimate Spoils of War Package - This is a working, two-player "sit-down" arcade cabinet being created especially for us by the folks at the Galloping Ghost Arcade. Includes internal PC, dual touch screen monitors, vinyl side art.  Also Includes all four Design Related Profile Badges, your Name in the Game\u2018s \u201cSpecial Thanks\u201d Credits, access to ongoing new content evaluation through out the development process, and the CHAOS CHAMPION - Spoils of War Package # 3. Sorry, we can only ship this within the continental United States.
